language.entry: Nightsister

The Nightsisters originate from the land of Ivalice - a distant and lost continent known mostly in legend. Known as truth-tellers and patrons of charitable causes, they will turn on even the church if lies are being told. Now, led by the vigilant Bellinda, they have converged on the hamlet to turn back the tide of Eldritch and Demons.
The Nightsister is an expert swordswoman who combines enate magical essence with her blade proficiency to generate powerful and mystical sword skills.
The Nightsister worships the moon and darkness of the night. At camp she can wield these elements through prayer and focus.
